item_description: 4 wheels, 3 shelves, 27 in long, 16 in wide, 32 in tall
Holds 500oz (~100 cups) of coffee/tea; DOES NOT include brewing machine
Warming tray hold 8qt, includes tray, cover, and stand; DOES NOT include fuel can(s) or tongs
Warming tray hold 6qt, includes tray, cover, and stand; DOES NOT include fuel can(s) or tongs
Warming tray hold 4qt, includes tray, cover, and stand; DOES NOT include fuel can(s) or tongs
Machine for brewing coffee into large coffee urn, holds 1 large filter bag per 500oz

Fuel can for warming tray, should last 6 hours, posibbly less, so be sure to bring extras to be safe. WARNING: Flammable (obviously), exercise appropriate safety measures when igniting and be sure you know where the nearest fire extinguisher is. Time off for burns sustained while being stupid will not be PTO.
